# Guide to Select Geoms

```{r}
#|wwarning: FALSE
#|message: FALSE
library(tidyverse)
a <- c('geom_area',
          'geom_abline',
          'geom_alluvium',
          'geom_arc',
          'geom_arc_bar',
          'geom_arrow',
          'geom_ash')
tribble(
  ~geom,  ~cat1, ~cat2, ~cat3, ~flow, ~q1, ~q2, ~q3, ~c1q1, ~q2c1
  "a", 1:3,
  "b", 4:6
)

```
